channel.title: Need a compiler for JDK 6 u7

item.title: Need a compiler for JDK 6 u7
item.dc:creator: @P_Aii_N P Aii N
item.description:
@P_Aii_N wrote:

"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" *.java

Or if that doesn’t work try this…

@echo off title 'Perfect Compiler' 2.0 if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) echo Used %p% to compile your files! if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. echo If the site does not show up, please go to: http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit

Credits to Taharok.

Read full topic
item.source: Need a compiler for JDK 6 u7

item.title: Need a compiler for JDK 6 u7

@11131 wrote:

or simply go on Run -> c:\Program Files\Java

And see what JDK you have and edit “jdk1.6.0_07” to W/E JDK you have lol
